text: Clube Atlético Pimentense, commonly known as Pimentense, is a Brazilian football club based in Pimenta Bueno, Rondônia state. ==History== The club was founded on March 8, 1987. ==Stadium== Clube Atlético Pimentense play their home games at Estádio Luiz Alves Athaíde. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 3,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1987 Category:Football clubs in Rondônia Category:1987 establishments in Brazil
title: Clube Atlético Pimentense
